snippet: Lawyers for the N.C.A.A. filed a brief with the National Labor Relations Board on Thursday supporting Northwestern University, which has been trying to fend off a movement by members of its football program to form a union.
abstract: Lawyers for NCAA file brief with National Labor Relations Board, supporting Northwestern University in its efforts to fend of movement by members of football program to form union; other college sports items noted.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for the N.C.A.A. filed a brief with the National Labor Relations Board on Thursday supporting Northwestern University, which has been trying to fend off a movement by members of its football program to form a union.

headline.main: Lawyers for N.C.A.A. Show Support for Northwestern
